title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after the default value is modified.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should not be lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Set a default value in the list box of a report parameter. 
2. Modify the default value and observe if the modified default value is retained or lost.
